## PHPRequest.method property
<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
method?: 'GET' | 'POST' | 'HEAD' | 'OPTIONS' | 'PATCH' | 'PUT' | 'DELETE';
```
Request method. Default: `GET`<!-- -->.
